# COVID-19

```{r echo = FALSE, error = FALSE, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE}
library(nCov2019)
library(maps)
library(chinamap)
China_Map = get_map_china()
China_Map$province <- trans_province(China_Map$province)
CoVid19 = get_nCov2019(lang = 'en')
```

```{r echo = FALSE, error = FALSE, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE}
plot(CoVid19, 
     region = 'china', 
     continuous_scale = FALSE,
     chinamap = China_Map, font.size = 2,
     title = "China"
     )
```

```{r echo = FALSE, error = FALSE, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE}
plot(CoVid19,
     continuous_scale = FALSE,
     font.size = 2,
     title = "The world"
     )
```
